title: SLFP to support the Ranil’s Government
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Freedom Party has decided to provide its full support to the government to uplift the country.
MP Dayasiri Jayasekera said the SLFP as a political party will only operate as per the decisions reached by the party.
He said a the Prime Minister was informed to directly communicate with the Chairman of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party with respect working with the government and the Prime Minister.
The MP said no discussion was made on ministerial positions, and the Prime Minister was informed the speak with the Chairman of the party on the said matter.
India bans wheat exports as heat wave hurts crop, domestic prices soar
